EmailTemplate.name: ContractorToEmployeeEmail
EmailTemplate.Body:
This is an automated notification from IdentityIQ.

Your former Contractor has been on-boarded as an Employee.


Sincerely,
IT Oversight Team
EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for notifying Manager that their new hire has been on-boarded.
EmailTemplate.Subject: Manager Notification - $identityFirstname New Hire
